qas.question: What political ideology did Nasser wholeheartedly back in 1961?
What was the document Nasser backed to push his socialist reforms?
What infrastructure project was part of the National Charter?
What year was the National Charter released?
What type of health care program was put forth in the National Charter?

context: In October 1961, Nasser embarked on a major nationalization program for Egypt, believing the total adoption of <a0_0>socialism<a0_0/> was the answer to his country's problems and would have prevented Syria's secession. In order to organize and solidify his popular base with Egypt's citizens and counter the army's influence, Nasser introduced the <a1_0>National Charter<a1_0/> in <a3_0>1962<a3_0/> and a new constitution. The charter called for <a4_0>universal<a4_0/> health care, affordable housing, vocational schools, greater women's rights and a family planning program, as well as <a2_0>widening the Suez Canal<a2_0/>.
